feed.title: Mini QR Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update ja.json by @tecking in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/67
  • add hackomania 2025 qr code preset by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/86
  • Put icon into language selector by @davidxhk in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/87

New Contributors

  • @tecking made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/67
  • @davidxhk made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve MiniQR UI by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/88
  • chore(package.json): update dependencies versions by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/89

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.11.0...v0.12.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add language selector with auto-detection and persistence by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/90
  • Add Scan mode to MiniQR by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/91
  • Add simple mobile drawer for QR code export by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/95

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.12.0...v0.13.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.13.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve QR code export UI responsiveness by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/97

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add PWA support for desktop and mobile installation by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/96

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.13.1...v0.14.0
